description: Xtra Teknologi is a company engaged in the field of services and supply of goods for the needs of various businesses. We always provide the best solutions with extra efforts to help grow your business.

founder.title: Xtra Solutions With Xtra Teknologi
founder.description: X-Technology is determined to provide IT, Business & Mechanical Electrical Solutions to meet and serve the growing market needs. We anticipate emerging market needs not only by selling products & services, but also by providing consulting & solutions, as well as establishing good relationships with clients & partners.
founder.quote: There is no problem that cannot be solved and nothing is impossible with Xtra Teknologi as your next business partner.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Us ?
why_choose_us.description: Xtra Teknologi conducts surveys to analyze, detect problems, discuss and then provide solutions. We can also immediately implement the best, most effective and efficient solutions in order to provide satisfactory results to our business partners

pt_xtra_teknologi_solusi.title: PT. XTRA TEKNOLOGI SOLUSI
pt_xtra_teknologi_solusi.description: PT. Xtra Teknologi Solusi (X-Technology) is an IT, Business and Mechanical Electrical consulting company which generally aims to provide the best solution that is expected to solve a problem that occurs to clients. Based on the deed of establishment of PT. Xtra Teknologi Solusi on February 2 2022 which was approved by a notary to focus on the development of web-based information systems & mobile apps, wholesale trading of computers & equipment. We are determined to provide the best IT, Business & Mechanical Electrical Solutions to meet and serve the changing market needs developing in Indonesia. PT. Xtra Teknologi Solusi (X-Teknologi) consists of various personnel with strong backgrounds & experience in each product solution because we provide ample opportunities for people to learn and develop to meet the increasingly complex and dynamic demands of the Technology & Business Industry.
vision_descriptions: Become a business partner as the best and most trusted information technology consultant in Indonesia.
mission_descriptions: Form each individual in Xtra Teknologi as a team of professional IT consultants
Always provide the best analysis and service to produce the best effective and efficient solutions
Xtra solutions for every problem faced by clients
